block.p: ALTMAN-Jonathan. A resident of Scarborough, N.Y. On October 26, 2000. Age 51. Beloved husband of Cynthia B. Altman, father of Sara, brother of Carol Morganstern, son of Zelda Weintraub Altman and the late Milton Altman. Funeral service on Sunday, 12 Noon, at Ballard-Durand Funeral Home, 2 Maple Avenue, White Plains, New York. Interment Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, New York.
